scenes.description: Nerissa Ravencroft and Mori Calliope exchange a dramatic dialogue regarding the origins of the first demon and the nature of desire.
Musical performance of the song 'Bocca della Verità' (ボッカデラベリタ) featuring a fast-paced battle sequence.

subtitles.original: What could you possibly know about the desire for the love and adoration of others?
subtitles.english: What could you possibly know about the desire for the love and adoration of others?

subtitles.original: You, who already has everything.
subtitles.english: You, who already has everything.

subtitles.original: You, and all the gods, all full of yourselves and so ready to look down upon those of us who fight for more.
subtitles.english: You, and all the gods, all full of yourselves and so ready to look down upon those of us who fight for more.

subtitles.original: Mouths full of twisted tongues...
subtitles.english: Mouths full of twisted tongues...

subtitles.original: Their hearts rot with jealousy.
subtitles.english: Their hearts rot with jealousy.

subtitles.original: They're jealous of me!
subtitles.english: They're jealous of me!

subtitles.original: Spiteful that I was loved more!
subtitles.english: Spiteful that I was loved more!

subtitles.original: Again, you cannot see past your own desires.
subtitles.english: Again, you cannot see past your own desires.

subtitles.original: The gods took pity on you and your kind.
subtitles.english: The gods took pity on you and your kind.

subtitles.original: When I created you, the first demon,
subtitles.english: When I created you, the first demon,

subtitles.original: the gods felt it unjust and dangerous for such a being to exist for the sole purpose
subtitles.english: the gods felt it unjust and dangerous for such a being to exist for the sole purpose

subtitles.original: of watching over the surface in my stead. To be mindless, soulless.
subtitles.english: of watching over the surface in my stead. To be mindless, soulless.

subtitles.original: So, they gave the demon a psyche
subtitles.english: So, they gave the demon a psyche

subtitles.original: and plucked it from my deepest and blackest halls,
subtitles.english: and plucked it from my deepest and blackest halls,

subtitles.original: freeing it to roam amongst the two worlds whenever it pleased.
subtitles.english: freeing it to roam amongst the two worlds whenever it pleased.

subtitles.original: I warned them that the demonic nature was too strong and dangerous to give such desires,
subtitles.english: I warned them that the demonic nature was too strong and dangerous to give such desires,

subtitles.original: and far too dangerous for such a being to exist alongside the mortals.
subtitles.english: and far too dangerous for such a being to exist alongside the mortals.

subtitles.original: But, the others persisted and now here we are.
subtitles.english: But, the others persisted and now here we are.

subtitles.original: My unheeded warnings leading us back to where it all started.
subtitles.english: My unheeded warnings leading us back to where it all started.

subtitles.original: You almost plunged the world into chaos due to your unbridled lust for adoration.
subtitles.english: You almost plunged the world into chaos due to your unbridled lust for adoration.

subtitles.original: Time and time again you gave in to your nature.
subtitles.english: Time and time again you gave in to your nature.

subtitles.original: Banishing you to a void was supposed to be a chance for you to reflect on your past,
subtitles.english: Banishing you to a void was supposed to be a chance for you to reflect on your past,

subtitles.original: but it has only proven that you are truly unfit for this world.
subtitles.english: but it has only proven that you are truly unfit for this world.

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃあたしは無い無い
subtitles.english: Without you, I am nothing

subtitles.original:
ボッカデラベリタ
Lyrics, Music: 柊キライ
subtitles.english:
Bocca della Verità
Lyrics, Music: Hiiragi Kirai

subtitles.original: はいはいそうですねその通りです
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that's right, exactly

subtitles.original: 喉を過ぎ去れば解の在り処
subtitles.english: Once it passes through the throat, the location of the solution

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: 君は軽薄くたびれだけ
subtitles.english: You are frivolous and only weary

subtitles.original: あたし一人じゃいられない
subtitles.english: I can't be alone

subtitles.original: それは常にひしひし
subtitles.english: That's always piercing

subtitles.original: あなたワイワイどうして？　でんでんダメですの
subtitles.english: You're noisy, why? Not good at all

subtitles.original: 意味があるなら言葉にせずに
subtitles.english: If there's a meaning, don't put it into words

subtitles.original: 正しさ態度で示さなきゃ
subtitles.english: You must show the correctness in your attitude

subtitles.original: すべてがずっと笑われないまま丸まる
subtitles.english: Everything keeps being laughed at as it curls up

subtitles.original: トップシークレット明かさないように
subtitles.english: Top secret, don't reveal it

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃあたしは無い無い
subtitles.english: Without you, I am nothing

subtitles.original: はいはいそうですねその通りです
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that's right, exactly

subtitles.original: 喉を過ぎればそれは真実
subtitles.english: Once it passes through the throat, that is the truth

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: やはり軽薄ご機嫌なあたし
subtitles.english: As expected, frivolous, me in high spirits

subtitles.original: 渇いた底冷えいずるの
subtitles.english: The dry, bone-chilling cold emerges

subtitles.original: 君がいまがいま踊る高嶺など
subtitles.english: The peak where you're dancing now

subtitles.original: トップシークレット愛に似た焦燥
subtitles.english: Top secret, impatience similar to love

subtitles.original: 喉を火傷させる
subtitles.english: Burning the throat

subtitles.original: シークレット
subtitles.english: Secret

subtitles.original: シークレット
subtitles.english: Secret

subtitles.original: 今に間に合う
subtitles.english: Just in time

subtitles.original: 出てこないで
subtitles.english: Don't come out

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: 君がいるからあたしが痛い
subtitles.english: Because you are here, I'm in pain

subtitles.original: はいはいそうですねその通りです
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that's right, exactly

subtitles.original: 欲を超えては落ちたくないの
subtitles.english: I don't want to fall beyond my desires

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: あたしたいなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I want to, what is it?

subtitles.original: アイアイヘイチューなななななんですの
subtitles.english: I-I-I-I hate you, what is it?

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃあたしは無い無い
subtitles.english: Without you, I am nothing

subtitles.original: はいはいそうですねその通りです
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that's right, exactly

subtitles.original: 喉を過ぎればそれは真実
subtitles.english: Once it passes through the throat, that is the truth
